name: Better Than Bean Run (FieryPotatoStudios) (FieryPotatoStudios)
description:
Better Than Bean Run (FieryPotatoStudios) (FieryPotatoStudios) is a game developed by FieryPotatoStudios. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play Better Than Bean Run (FieryPotatoStudios) (FieryPotatoStudios) on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
